sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
French: Le cri de la guerre pour la justice était tout excitée à la chagrin des autorités.
backtrans: The cry of the war for justice was excited to the grief of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
French: La décision du régime prépare l'ordre du jour sous-jacent.
backtrans: The decision of the regime prepares the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
French: La communauté était anxieuse sur le passage des réformes bien indispensables.
backtrans: The community was anxious about the passage of the reforms well indispensable.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
French: Le groupe de réflexion a publié un document décrivant leurs excuses de la peine capitale.
backtrans: The think tank has published a document describing their apology for capital punishment.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
French: Aught a été laissé de la validité de la pétition
backtrans: Aught has been left of the validity of the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
French: Le président a exhorté ses ministres à se faufiler comme un soutien clé de l'opposition à son plan économique était sur le point de boucler.
backtrans: The Chairman urged his ministers to sneak as a key support of the opposition to his economic plan was about to go.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
French: Les électeurs ont été percés de voir la facture passée.
backtrans: Voters were pierced to see the past invoice.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
French: La narration discursive de l'avocat a balancé le jury.
backtrans: The discursive narration of the lawyer swung the jury.

French: Le tribunal a enjoint la violence!

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
French: Le bloc de l'UE s'est opposé à une éventuelle imposition de mesures antidumping.
backtrans: The EU bloc has opposed a possible imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
French: Une élimination exhaustive a été livrée par le conseil de Sly.
backtrans: Exhaustive elimination was delivered by Sly Council.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
French: L'agence GIG-Economy a décidé de garnir les remboursements!
backtrans: The Gig-Economy agency has decided to garnish the refunds!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
French: Les membres du mouvement révolutionnaire antiocratique ont renversé les pairs au pouvoir!
backtrans: The members of the anticropular revolutionary movement have overturned peers in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
French: Les traîtres ont décidé de se battre avec les coloniaux.
backtrans: The traitors decided to fight with the colonials.
